summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Financial Forecasting & KPI Dashboard. Backend APIs are 100% functional (11/11 tests passed) with all core functionality working perfectly. Frontend is 95% functional with all major features working. AI narrative generation with GPT-5.2 is fully operational and generating executive-quality insights.

ui_bugs.issue: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height)
ui_bugs.selector: All chart containers in Trend Analysis and Forecast tabs
ui_bugs.impact: Console warnings only, charts render and function correctly

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with header, controls, and proper layout
Load Sample Data button works and populates KPI cards successfully
KPI cards display Revenue, Gross Margin, Operating Margin, Net Margin with correct values
Period selector allows switching between months (tested 2024-11 selection)
Scenario selector shows Base/Upside/Downside/Stress options (tested Upside selection)
Trend Analysis tab shows revenue and margin charts correctly
Variance Analysis tab shows variance table with Favorable/Unfavorable status
Forecast Scenarios tab shows projected values and forecast chart
AI Narrative panel with focus selector works (tested Variance Deep-Dive)
Generate narrative button calls AI and displays results successfully
File upload input and run selector are present and functional
/api/ returns API info with correct target users
/api/sample-data creates analysis run successfully
/api/runs lists analysis runs (1 run found)
/api/runs/{run_id}/kpis returns calculated KPIs (6 periods)
/api/runs/{run_id}/variances returns variance analysis (9 metrics)
/api/runs/{run_id}/forecasts returns forecast scenarios (4 scenarios)
/api/kpi-definitions returns KPI definitions (9 definitions)
AI narrative generation with GPT-5.2 produces executive summary, key insights, and recommendations
All navigation and interactive elements work smoothly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major functionality working, minor chart console warnings)
